job.description: dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers our client sovereign technologies is seeking the following apply via dice todayltbrgtltbrgttitle embedded sw engineer c location mossville il duration months rate open visa status any work status candidate responsibilities this is a position for a software engineer to develop onboard core information software for displays and telematics used on caterpillar machine engine applications the candidatersquos duties will include but are not limited to developing configuring and testing onboard core information software troubleshooting and correcting software issues and reporting development status this position involves working closely with systems engineers and the core information software development team typical day the candidate will be developing configuring and testing onboard core information software they will also be troubleshooting and correcting software issues there is a daily standup for reporting development status education requirement bsee bsce or bscs technical skills required o required qualifications sect bsee bsce or bscs sect years of development experience using c andor c programming languages sect years of development experience with linux kernel linux device drivers sect prior experience with embedded software development design and architecture o desired qualifications sect desire to work in a fastpaced agile team environment sect experience in cybersecurity sect experience with git configuration management tool sect ability to read electrical schematics sect experience with scripting using python sect experience with rtos development ie free rtos sect experience with ethernet tcpip and wifi sect experience with can j and other data link protocols sect experience using design patterns and object oriented programming sect experience with developing unit tests and test driven development sect experience using debugging tools for embedded systems eg lauterbach gdb soft skills required team player good communication
